jd: Hello Trust you are doing well I have this excellent job opportunity. Please find the detailed job description below for insight and help me with your latest resume to take it further for interview Position: Application Developer Location: Hartford, CT 06105 (Hybrid - Prefer Local candidates only.) Duration: 8 Months Legacy System Conversion: Assist in converting legacy .NET applications to the Microsoft Power Platform, ensuring smooth integration with Power Apps, Power Pages, and portals while maintaining full functionality and performance. Legacy Application Support: Provide ongoing maintenance and support for existing .NET legacy applications, addressing technical issues, performing updates, and ensuring continued operation and performance. API Integration: Develop and implement robust API integration solutions to connect external applications and systems, ensuring secure and efficient data exchange across platforms. Data Model Design: Collaborate with database administrators (DBAs) to design efficient data models, optimize queries, and maintain data integrity across both legacy systems and new Power Platform applications. SDLC Proficiency: Exhibit expertise in the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), with experience in both waterfall and agile methodologies, ensuring timely project delivery and alignment with project goals. Development Standards: Follow established development practices, proactively identifying opportunities for process improvements to enhance overall development quality and efficiency. Technical Expertise: · Proficiency in programming languages such as VB.NET, Java/J2EE, and API development. · Strong experience with Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Pages, Portals). – Mandatory. · Hands-on experience in setting up Integrated Development Environments (IDEs) and writing unit and feature tests. · Ability to run and optimize SQL queries, contributing to both development and testing efforts. – Mandatory. · Best Practices & Operational Knowledge: Demonstrated knowledge of best practices in systems deployment, testing, operations, administration, and disaster recovery. · Microsoft Certification – Mandatory.
